title: ‘HIJRAH’ OF THE MIND NEEDED TO ATTAIN SUCCESS (Universiti Sains Malaysia)
text: ( Source : Universiti Sains Malaysia ) PENANG, 19 October 2015 - In order for Universiti Sains Malaysia ( USM ) to attain success in the future, its community needs to do a 'hijrah' (shift) of the mind in totality and in togetherness. That was
